channel.title: Random Lab Spikes - On a Rail
channel.description:
I encountered lag spikes/frame stuttering in this general area in On a Rail. Only reason I'm reporting it is because as soon as I left, they stopped and came back immediately upon return, then stopped as soon as I left.
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)
